info.task: navigate out of listbox popup by moving editing cursor to end of textbox
info.title: Navigate out of a listbox popup by moving the editing cursor to the end of the textbox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAlabamaInListboxAndSetInputCursorAtBeginning
setupScript.description: expands the combobox,  sets the combobox value to 'Alabama', places focus on that option in the listbox popup and positions the editing cursor at the beginning of the textbox

user: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, navigate back to the textbox by moving the editing cursor to the end of the text.
instructions.raw: With focus on an option in the listbox popup, navigate back to the textbox by moving the editing cursor to the end of the text.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (expanded) is conveyed
Text of the selected option ('Alabama') is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
Cursor position (at the end of the textbox) is conveyed
